DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a drama workshop program for immigrant and refugee youth is effective in reducing impairment in high school students presenting learning difficulties.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of a Drama Workshop Program for Immigrant and Refugee Adolescents
DOC.criteria: All students who are assigned to special classes based on behavioural or learning problems in grades 710 in the participating schools will participate in the program and be included in the study if they and their parents consent to in the research. More severe cases
